name: Granatum
tag_list: financial, business, money, accounting, bookkeeping, collaboration, clients, suppliers, goals, financial-planning, saas
overview:
The Granatum is an enterprise financial controls designed especially for micro and small enterprises. And its simplified approach to key financial concepts, teaches and helps entrepreneurs to make effective financial management of a company from the cycle of control, verification, and action planning your cash flow.

Unlike other financial software on the market, which have many features that the business does not use the functionality Granatum presents only essential for effective financial control. You can sign up customers and suppliers, make entries of revenues and expenses, categorize and group entries, view and print reports and create goals for categories or cost centers. To facilitate the launch of financial transactions, you can also import files from bank statements.

Its evolution is made from feedback from its users, suggesting corrections, improvements and new features: are entrepreneurs across the world helping to build a unique tool of financial management for small businesses.

The Granatum is a web application, available on the Internet (24 hours a day, 7 days a week) and can be accessed from anywhere. You do not have to worry about installations, maintenance and software upgrades and even servers. To use Granatum, all you need is a computer or cell phone with Internet access and a browser. You also need not worry about security: Granatum uses the same data encryption of the largest banks and keeps daily copies (backups) of all your data.

The Business Granatum was designed from a very noble vision: to reduce the mortality rate of micro and small enterprises.
